item.title: Second federal judge in New York orders release of Epstein files
item.description: Judge Richard M. Berman says a law Congress passed last month overrides the usual secrecy of grand jury proceedings.

item.title: Shapiro, Cox cross aisle to denounce the rise in political violence
item.description: Govs. Josh Shapiro (D) and Spencer Cox (R) join forces to denounce the rise in political violence in the past few years.

item.title: Texas midterms point to ideological corners, not swing-state issues
item.description: Next year’s contests seem destined to produce a congressional delegation of staunch conservatives and liberals, as determined by primary voters.

item.title: At the first stop on his affordability tour, Trump mocks affordability

item.title: House panel plans to end its boat strike probe, GOP chair says
item.description: Lawmakers in the House and Senate have been scrutinizing the U.S. military’s killing of two alleged drug smugglers who survived an attack on their boa...
